A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some where in there is a good movie\, but this is not Star Wars. The humor and pacing were way off and that Leia scene was so stupid. A ton of plots that ultimately meant very little\, and why all the cutesy creatures? Time will not be kind to this one. Maybe TFA was a copy of the original\, but this movie doesn't understand what makes Star Wars special.
